9. Finally, in the tenth and eleventh rows (Triston Grant and John Carter), both were drafted in round 9, but no player was drafted twice yet in that round.
10. After going through each row, I find that only one player (Rob Bellamy) was drafted exactly once (in round 3). All other players were either drafted multiple times within the same round or not found in round 3 at all.
